name: Team 18 - Fuel Refiller
description:
Discover Fuel Refiller!

We made this game during a 4-day game jam, with the requirements of making a game inspired by Oil Panic on Game & Watch. Our game features gameplay around oil with a look and feel accurate to the original Game & Watch console.

Refill cars that pass by your station while minding to refill your jerrycan as well! But be careful not to fuel the wrong vehicles, you could be very much surprised... Enjoy!

- By Julien Aberton, Théo Driutti, Melvin Litière, Paul Putegnat, Teliau Simon Troalen, Térence Thellier and Chloé Vallot -
